headers.subject: [tosdr:2914] Twitch [Good] (Contact) Information of how to control stored personal data

subject: Twitch [Good] (Contact) Information of how to control stored personal data
text:
Twitch.tv Privacy Policy
http://www.twitch.tv/user/legal?page=privacy_policy

> Your Choices
> …
> If you would like to access, review, correct, update, suppress, or otherwise limit our use of your personal information you have previously provided directly to us, you may contact us as outlined in the last section of this Privacy Policy titled “ Twitch Contact Information ”; or using the mechanism provided below.

Contact via email with full personal details for verifications in order to view or modify stored personal information.

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
